message: We've been in business for 8 years now, specializing in artificial turf installation for residential and commercial properties throughout South Florida. Our website is turfgrassartificialsolution.com and we service areas within 50 miles of Miami. We have all necessary licenses and insurance, and our phone number is (954) 555-0123. We're ready to start bidding on landscaping and turf installation projects. Can you create our contractor account now?
